name: Game Boy
description:: The Game Boy is an 8-bit handheld video game device developed and manufactured by Nintendo, which was released in Japan on April 21, 1989, in North America on July 31, 1989, and in Europe on September 28, 1990. It is the first handheld console in the Game Boy line, and was created by Gunpei Yokoi and Nintendo Research & Development 1â€”the same staff who had designed the Game & Watch series
version: The Original first version (does not a power LED)
